mapper.insert: insert into stuff (id, create_date, modify_date, email, is_enabled, is_locked, locked_date, login_date, login_failure_count, login_ip, password, username, name, gender, seniority, age, depart, rank, birthday, employment_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lockedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginFailureCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{seniority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{depart,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{employmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update stuff set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_enabled = #{isEnabled,jdbcType=BIT}, is_locked = #{isLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, locked_date = #{lockedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_date = #{loginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_failure_count = #{loginFailureCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, seniority = #{seniority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, depart = #{depart,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, employment_date = #{employmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, create_date, modify_date, email, is_enabled, is_locked, locked_date, login_date, login_failure_count, login_ip, password, username, name, gender, seniority, age, depart, rank, birthday, employment_date from stuff where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select id, create_date, modify_date, email, is_enabled, is_locked, locked_date, login_date, login_failure_count, login_ip, password, username, name, gender, seniority, age, depart, rank, birthday, employment_date from stuff where username = #{0}

select f.id, f.create_date, f.modify_date, f.email, f.is_enabled, f.is_locked, f.locked_date, f.login_date, f.login_failure_count, f.login_ip, f.password, f.username, f.name, f.gender, f.seniority, f.age, d.department_name depart, f.rank, f.birthday, f.employment_date from stuff f,department d where f.department_id=d.id and f.username = #{0}

select id, create_date, modify_date, email, is_enabled, is_locked, locked_date, login_date, login_failure_count, login_ip, password, username, name, gender, seniority, age, depart, rank, birthday, employment_date from stuff

select id, create_date, modify_date, email, is_enabled, is_locked, locked_date, login_date, login_failure_count, login_ip, password, username, name, gender, seniority, age, depart, rank, birthday, employment_date from stuff order by depart desc,rank desc,name desc,username desc
